attributes.action: Change energy minister, not believing in climate change is akin to having a witch doctor in charge of the Nhs
attributes.additional_details:
The evidence for man made climate change is unequivocal.  By engaging an energy minister who does not believe in climate change we are opening the country up to irreversible risk.

This petition calls upon the government to address this serious ministerial failing and debate the opportunity costs of not engaging a minister who engages with scientifically proven anthropogenic climate change.
